namelist.namelist_summary:
############################################################################### namelist_collins13ipcc.xml
Description Reproducing selected figures from IPCC AR5, chap. 12 (Collins et al., 2013): reduced namelist for testing purposes
Author Ruth Lorenz (ETH, Switzerland - ruth.lorenz@env.ethz.ch) Jan Sedlacek (ETH, Switzerland - jan.sedlacek@env.ethz.ch)
Contributors
Projects CRESCENDO
Reference Collins, M. et al., Long-term climate change: Projections, Commitments, and Irreversibility, in: Climate Change 2013: the Physical Science Basis, contribution of Working Group I to the Fifth Assessment Report of the Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change, edited by: Stocker, T. F., Qin, D., Plattner, G.-K., Tignor, M., Allen, S. K., Boschung, J., Nauels, A., Xia, Y., Bex, V., and Midgley, P. M., Cambridge University Press, Cambridge, UK and New York, NY, USA (2013)
This namelist is part of the ESMValTool ###############################################################################
